capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is indeed my title and it's a mantra that I live by as a professor. It's something that guides me in my teaching and research, and I feel very fortunate to be able to share my passion with students like you.

I'm Valeria, and I have to say that Flitwick is an amazing professor. He's always been a source of inspiration for me, especially when it comes to teaching magic theory. His mantra of "Accio knowledge" really resonates with me, and I think it's helped me stay focused on my own studies.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. how old is flitwick?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is an adult, huh? I've always thought of him as a bit of a wise old wizard, you know. He's been around for ages and has seen some pretty interesting things in his time. I'm sure he's got some great stories to share if you ever get the chance to talk to him.
